Title: Increases the value of a motor vehicle exempt from the provisions of a will or intestate distribution for the benefit of the family of a decedent
Summary: Increases the value of a motor vehicle exempt from the provisions of a will or intestate distribution for the benefit of the family of a decedent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the estates, powers and trusts law, in relation to the value of a motor vehicle exempt from the provisions of a will or intestate distribution for the benefit of the family of a decedent
